verifications.claim: AIによるPRの自動レビューとマージができる
verifications.name: AI Review and Fix
verifications.description: Review and automatically fix code issues using Claude Code CLI.

verifications.claim: Markdown仕様書からコードを自動生成できる
verifications.name: Spec to Code
verifications.description: Generate code from Markdown specifications using Claude Code CLI

verifications.claim: WorkflowエラーをAIが自動修正できる
verifications.name: GitHub Actions Fixer
verifications.description: Validate and auto-fix common GitHub Actions workflow errors

verifications.claim: 自然言語の指示でコードをリファクタリングできる
verifications.name: Auto Refactor
verifications.description: Automatically refactor code using Claude Code CLI

verifications.claim: コード変更を検知しドキュメントを自動更新できる
verifications.name: Auto Document
verifications.description: Automatically update documentation based on code changes using Claude Code CLI

verifications.claim: コミット履歴からリリースノートを生成できる
verifications.name: AI Release Notes
verifications.description: Generate high-quality release notes from commit history using Claude Code CLI

verifications.claim: PRが条件を満たす場合に自動マージできる
verifications.name: Auto Merge PR
verifications.description: Merge a pull request with specified method

verifications.claim: PRの競合をAIが自動解決しながらリベースできる
verifications.name: Auto Rebase PR with Automatic Conflict Resolution
verifications.description: Automatically rebase a PR and resolve conflicts by preferring PR branch changes

verifications.claim: AIレビュー後、CIパス時に自動マージできる
verifications.name: Review and Auto-Merge PR

verifications.claim: ドラフトPRを自動的にレビュー準備完了に変更できる
verifications.name: Publish PR
verifications.description: Convert a draft pull request to ready for review

verifications.claim: 複数のPRを一括マージできる
verifications.name: Bulk Merge PRs
verifications.description: Merge multiple pull requests that are ready (CLEAN status)

verifications.claim: 複数のPRを一括リベースできる
verifications.name: Bulk Rebase PRs
verifications.description: Rebase multiple pull requests against latest base branch

verifications.claim: PRをスキャンしAIレビューキューに自動登録できる
verifications.name: PR Review Enqueuer
verifications.description: Scans open PRs and adds /review comment to trigger review workflow
